verses.text: Mamin Jehová, tik val sval in b'a t'ayach.
Ach in Diosal, a achnhej tzach vak'och yipoc in k'ool. Manh in actejcan t'a skal nivac q'uixvelal. Manh in a cha yak' ganar eb' ajk'ool yajoch t'ayin yic max tzalaj eb' in stzetzani.
Vojtac val to a masanil eb' tzach ak'anoch yipoc sk'ool, manh ol q'uixvoquel-laj eb'. Ha eb' schichon sk'ol t'ayach t'a nab'anhej, q'uixvocab'el eb'.
Mamin Jehová, ch'ox a b'e t'ayin. D'a juntzanh a b'e chi' tzin ik' b'eyoc.
k'ayb'ej in t'a a lolonel te yel, yic wach' tzin b'ey t'a wach'il, yujto in Diosal ach, in Columal ach. Ha achnhej tzach vak'och yipoc in k'ool t'a masanil tiempo.
Mamin Jehová, nacot a chamk'olal yet' a wach'k'olal, jun toxonton ix ak' quila'.
Axo pax juntzanh in mul jun, manhxo a nacoti. Manhxoocab' a nacot in chucal t'a yictax ix vak'an quelemal. Mamin, tzin a nacot yet' a niwan chamk'olal yet' a wach'k'olal.
Mamin Jehová, wach' ach toni, tojol ach toni. Yuj chi' tza tojolb'itej sb'eyb'al eb' sk'ulan chucal.
Tza ch'oxan pax eb' emnaquil t'a sb'eal tojolal, aton b'eyb'al tza nib'ej.
Yuj a wach'k'olal, yujto tza k'anab'ajej pax tas tzala', yuj chi' tza cuchb'ej eb' sk'anab'ajan a checnab'il icha syal a trato.
Mamin Jehová, te niwan in chucal. Ak' in nivank'olal icha val ix utej alani.
Ha mach tzach k'anab'ajani, tza k'ayb'ej eb'. D'a jun b'e wach' tzik'b'at eb'.
Toxonton tzik'chaanh eb'. Ha eb' yuninal eb' ol icancan lum lum tik.
Ha eb' ay elk'och t'a sat, aton eb' ay xivk'olal t'ayach, tzak' razón t'a eb', tzak'an pax elk'och a trato t'a eb'.
Mamin Jehová, anhej t'ayach ayoch in pensar. Ha ach ol in a colel t'a ch'anh yaal.
Mamin, ilincoti, ok'oc val a k'ool t'ayin. Ina to in ch'ocojil, te ay in och t'a ilk'olal.
Ix te nivanb'i vilk'olal tik, colinel t'a in somk'olal.
Ilincot t'a in cusk'olal yet' t'a in yaelal, tzak'ancan nivank'olal in chucal.
Il tonab'i, manh jantacoc eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, ste chichonoch sk'ol eb' t'ayin.
Tanhvej in, manh in a cha chamoc, manh in a chab'at t'a nivac q'uixvelal, yujto a t'ayach tzin col in b'a.
Comonoc tzin a colo', yujto wach' in b'eyb'al, malaj in mul. Ha ach ayachoch yipoc in k'ool.
Ach in Diosal, colonhcanel a onh israel onh tik t'a co cusk'olal yuj masanil syaelal.
